title: Gloom and Doom Could Lead to Several Positive Surprises
text:
I found last week particularly confusing to tradeA lot of things were going on, but over and over it seemed as though the market latched on to the negatives and ignored the positivesRepo Suddenly everyone was talking about the repo rateI believe this is a function of regulations, especially for banksRegulations have made this a low return on capit...

description: it seems that consensus is to interpret anything that can be viewed as bad, as actually bad, and anything that could be good, as an aberration that will soon become bad.
authors: Doom Could Lead To Several Positive Surprises
It Seems That Consensus Is To Interpret Anything That Can Be Viewed As Bad
As An Aberration That Will Soon Become Bad.
